member.name: F:P2PCommunicationTesting.Mod1.numProcesses
member.summary: Title: P2P Communication Testing Summary: A simulation of P2P communication using causal ordering Assumptions: Reliable network communication, no fault tolerance, no join/leave Submitted by: Halen Whiston, Shalini Bhattacharjee Course: 60-512 Semester: Winter 2016 Due: February 28
